characters.name: Yato
characters.description:
__Race:__ God
__Height:__ 174 cm (5’8”)
__Occupation:__ God of War, Delivery God, God of Calamity (previously) 

Yato is one of the three main protagonists of Noragami. An obscure god who considers himself a God of Fortune / Happiness and War, he has been labeled a God of Calamity and Depression in the past. Yato's dream is to become a famous god, whom everyone worships.

Yato can be mischievous, crude, and unpredictable in his behavior. He often has a low tolerance for something he wants, usually causing those around him to become upset. Furthermore, he is rather childish and gullible at times. Yato will often indulge in fantasies of being a very successful God with more followers than any other deity; shrines full of luxury and shrine maiden at his fingertips. As his existence would end if he were to be forgotten, he has developed Athazagoraphobia.

~!It is revealed that Yato's real name is Yaboku (夜卜) Yaboku contains the kanji ya (夜 night) and boku (卜 divination). [Sakura](https://anilist.co/character/189754/Sakura) mistakenly read 卜 as the katakana ト to because of the similarities, thus giving the well-known alias name Yato.!~

characters.name: Hiyori Iki
characters.description:
__Race:__ Hanyou (Half Phantom, Half Human)
__Height:__ 162,5 cm (~5'4")

Hiyori Iki is a Half-Phantom who can leave her human body, being like this since she "saved" [Yato](https://anilist.co/character/84677/Yato) from an incoming bus. Despite being raised to be completely lady-like in a rich household, Hiyori is a huge martial arts fan and has a fixation on a martial artist called Touno, whom she adores and copies her attacks from. She often becomes inspired and acts on his words.

Hiyori is a very pure, kind-hearted, and brave girl who will go out of her way to help someone in danger, even strangers, regardless of the severe consequences, including suffering from blight. She has a strong moral compass and is not above calling people out if she feels their actions are wrong. Hiyori is also extremely perceptive of those around her, but despite that she can be a bit air-headed too. 

She also has a strong liking to Yato's smell and even called it her favorite smell on one occasion, but she becomes rather embarrassed by how much she likes it and dodges the subject whenever it is brought up.

characters.name: Yukine
characters.description:
__Race:__ Shinki
__Height:__147cm (4'10")

While wandering about as a spirit, Yukine was picked up by Yato and made into a Shinki. When called "Sekki" he transforms into a katana.

~!He died at a young age, making him miss his normal life as a middle schooler. He acts like his age, and was once stealing money from people with the excuse that it's okay since he's dead. After being "saved" by Hiyori, he becomes more obedient and respects Yato and Hiyori. When he was alive he had trouble with his father as seen by Yato when he first obtains Yukine.!~

In a katana form, he finds Yato's sweaty hands so disgusting that he calls him "Drippy."

characters.name: Toto-sama
characters.description: The main antagonist of Noragami, as well as ~!Yato's and Nora's parents.!~ What lies underneath his mysterious appearance is a deep hatred for the gods and by extension, the humans who worship them after a tragic death of a loved one. He is a skilled manipulator and is very vocal about the heaven's injustice.

characters.name: Bishamon
characters.description:
__Race:__ God
__Occupation:__ Goddess of Fortune and Goddess of War

Bishamon is one of the Seven Gods of Fortune and also officially a Goddess of War and Warriors. She is intent on keeping order among the gods. Due to her past with [Yato](https://anilist.co/character/84677/Yato), she is bent on vengeance and decided to destroy anything he held dear to himself. 

Despite being a goddess, Bishamon is shown to be quite generous towards her Shinki. She willingly accepts any wandering and troubled spirit, useful or not, and adds them to her family. Due to her failure in the past involving Shinki, Bishamon decides to be more distant from them, depicting herself as a fierce goddess and making sure that they are not worried about her, which only resulted to them being more insecure and lonely.

In the anime, Bishamon's hair is depicted as blonde, as opposed of the silver hair in the manga.

characters.name: Kazuma
characters.description:
__Race:__ Shinki

Kazuma is a calm, serious, and sensible person. He is one of [Bishamon's](https://anilist.co/character/88239/Bishamon) Shinki and cares about her deeply. When he is called by his shinki name, "Chouki", Kazuma transforms into a cherry blossom-shaped earring with the ability to navigate and track others. 
~!He is a Blessed Regalia.!~

characters.name: Kofuku Ebisu
characters.description: Originally introduced as [Yato's](https://anilist.co/character/84677/Yato) girlfriend that he frequently shakes down for money, Kofuku is later revealed to be the infamous Binbougami - a Japanese Goddess of Poverty. She goes by the cover name "Kofuku Ebisu" in order to make it seem as though she is a god of fortune. She has a Shinki named [Daikoku](https://anilist.co/character/88691/Daikoku).

characters.name: Tenjin
characters.description: He is the infamous god of academics. He has several shinki, all of them women (including Yato's former shinki); and has his own shrine, much to Yato's envy. He would sometimes assume human form to intervene if, for example, Yato goes out of control playing around.

characters.name: Daikoku
characters.description: Daikoku is [Kofuku's](https://anilist.co/character/88241) somewhat overprotective shinki. He regards himself as Kofuku's husband.

characters.name: Nora
characters.description:
__Race:__ Shinki
__Occupation:__ Stray

__Nora__ is a former shinki of [Yato](https://anilist.co/character/84677/Yato). "Nora," meaning "stray," is how the gods call any shinki who has many masters and many names, most notable owners of Nora are ~! [Ebisu](https://anilist.co/character/89120/Ebisu) and [Takemikazuchi](https://anilist.co/character/159592/Takemikazuchi) !~

Nora, at first comes off as very gentle and kind. She seems to care deeply for Yato, and continually prompts him to use her, because she was once a human and all she wanted was to have a family that cared about her. 

~!Later, it is revealed how manipulating and cruel she is. She tries to kill Yukine, as well as taunt him, due to the fact that he was impure, but also because she wants Yato to use her instead of him. She also tries to kill Hiyori due to how close she has gotten to Yato and believing she has softened him. She is depicted to show interest in anything with beauty, as shown when she commented on Yukine's eyes. She, just as Yato, is influenced and controlled by the actions and demands of "Father". Although she is initially seen as a villain, she is another puppet in the grand scheme of Yato's father. !~

characters.name: Ebisu
characters.description:
__Race:__ God
__Age:__ Ancient
__Occupation:__ God of Fishing and Commerce

__Ebisu__ is one of the Seven Gods of Fortune. He is the humorless God of Fishing and Commerce.

Initially, Ebisu appears very stoic, always bearing a near-emotionless facial expression and speaking in a reserved, polite, yet aloof tone. He is also highly pragmatic and resourceful, constantly progressing towards his goals and willing to go to great lengths to achieve what he is after. Despite his aloof appearance and personality, he can actually be a silly person, making him appear rather comically serious at times. He is a kind god at heart.

~!Ebisu is later revealed to be attempting to gain control over phantoms; a severe taboo if not sin in the eyes of the heavensl.!~

characters.name: Aiha
characters.description: Aiha (藍巴) is one of Bishamonten's Shinki. As a Shinki, she takes the form of a medieval suit of armour with a long skirt.

characters.name: Kouto Fujisaki
characters.description:
__Age:__ Looks 16, 1100+ (real)

Fujisaki Kouto (藤崎浩人, Fujisaki Kōto) is a third year student at Hiyori Iki's school. ~!He is possessed by Yato and Nora’s "Father", a conjurer of phantoms who deceived the gods.!~

characters.name: Izanami
characters.description: Izanami (イザナミ) is one of the most powerful gods, serving as the Queen of the Underworld. She is also the "mother" of the first gods, including Ebisu.

characters.name: Kinuha
characters.description: Kinuha (紝巴), is a current Regalia to Bishamonten. She turns into a whip in her shinki form. Her vessel name is Jinki (紝器).
